verses.verse: And there appeared <S%G3700><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> wonder <S%G4592><s%> in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> with the sun, <S%G2246><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> her feet, <S%G4228><s%> and on her head <S%G2776><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of twelve <S%G1427><s%> stars: <S%G792><s%>
And she being <S%G2192><s%> with child <S%G1722><s%> cried, <S%G2896><s%> travailing <S%G5605><s%> in birth, <S%G5605><s%> and pained <S%G928><s%> to be delivered. <S%G5088><s%>

And there appeared <S%G3700><s%> another <S%G243><s%> wonder <S%G4592><s%> in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> and behold <S%G2400><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> red <S%G4450><s%> dragon, <S%G1404><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and ten <S%G1176><s%> horns, <S%G2768><s%> and seven <S%G2033><s%> crowns <S%G1238><s%> on his heads. <S%G2776><s%>

And his tail <S%G3769><s%> drew <S%G4951><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> part of the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and did cast <S%G906><s%> them to the earth: <S%G1093><s%> and the dragon <S%G1404><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was ready <S%G3195><s%> to be delivered, <S%G5088><s%> for to devour <S%G2719><s%> her child <S%G5043><s%> as soon <S%G3752><s%> as it was born. <S%G5088><s%>

And she brought <S%G5088><s%> forth <S%G5088><s%> a man <S%G730><s%> child, <S%G5207><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was to rule <S%G4165><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> with a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron: <S%G4603><s%> and her child <S%G5043><s%> was caught <S%G726><s%> up to God, <S%G2316><s%> and to his throne. <S%G2362><s%>

And the woman <S%G1135><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> she has <S%G2192><s%> a place <S%G5117><s%> prepared <S%G2090><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that they should feed <S%G5142><s%> her there <S%G1563><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> and three score <S%G1835><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

And there was war <S%G4171><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> and his angels <S%G32><s%> fought <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the dragon; <S%G1404><s%> and the dragon <S%G1404><s%> fought <S%G4170><s%> and his angels, <S%G32><s%>
And prevailed <S%G2480><s%> not; neither <S%G3777><s%> was their place <S%G5117><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> any <S%G2089><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And the great <S%G3173><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> was cast <S%G906><s%> out, that old <S%G744><s%> serpent, <S%G3789><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> the Devil, <S%G1228><s%> and Satan, <S%G4567><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> deceives <S%G4105><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world: <S%G3625><s%> he was cast <S%G906><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and his angels <S%G32><s%> were cast <S%G906><s%> out with him.

And I heard <S%G191><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> is come <S%G1096><s%> salvation, <S%G4991><s%> and strength, <S%G1411><s%> and the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of our God, <S%G2316><s%> and the power <S%G1849><s%> of his Christ: <S%G5547><s%> for the accuser <S%G2725><s%> of our brothers <S%G80><s%> is cast <S%G2598><s%> down, <S%G2598><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> accused <S%G2723><s%> them before <S%G1799><s%> our God <S%G2316><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and night. <S%G3571><s%>

And they overcame <S%G3528><s%> him by the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> and by the word <S%G3056><s%> of their testimony; <S%G3141><s%> and they loved <S%G25><s%> not their lives <S%G5590><s%> to the death. <S%G2288><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> rejoice, <S%G2165><s%> you heavens, <S%G3772><s%> and you that dwell <S%G4637><s%> in them. Woe <S%G3759><s%> to the inhabitants <S%G2730><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> and of the sea! <S%G2281><s%> for the devil <S%G1228><s%> is come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to you, having <S%G2192><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wrath, <S%G2372><s%> because he knows <S%G1492><s%> that he has <S%G2192><s%> but a short <S%G3641><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

And when <S%G3753><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that he was cast <S%G906><s%> to the earth, <S%G1093><s%> he persecuted <S%G1377><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> brought <S%G5088><s%> forth <S%G5088><s%> the man <S%G730><s%> child.

And to the woman <S%G1135><s%> were given <S%G1325><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> wings <S%G4420><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> eagle, <S%G105><s%> that she might fly <S%G4072><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> her place, <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> she is nourished <S%G5142><s%> for a time, <S%G2540><s%> and times, <S%G2540><s%> and half <S%G2255><s%> a time, <S%G2540><s%> from the face <S%G4383><s%> of the serpent. <S%G3789><s%>

And the serpent <S%G3789><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> out of his mouth <S%G4750><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> as a flood <S%G4215><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> that he might cause <S%G4160><s%> her to be carried <S%G4216><s%> away of the flood. <S%G4216><s%>

And the earth <S%G1093><s%> helped <S%G997><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and the earth <S%G1093><s%> opened <S%G455><s%> her mouth, <S%G4750><s%> and swallowed <S%G2666><s%> up the flood <S%G4215><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the dragon <S%G1404><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> out of his mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

And the dragon <S%G1404><s%> was wroth <S%G3710><s%> with the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with the remnant <S%G3062><s%> of her seed, <S%G4690><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
